(ROOT
  (SINV
    (ADVP (RB Ever))
    (VP (VBD wondered)
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB why))
        (S
          (NP (PRP You)))))
    (NP (NNP Char) (NNP Kway))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB always))
      (VBN come)
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (DT a) (NN pair))))
    (. ?)))

prep(come-8, in-9)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP mean)

        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (MD would)

              (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ easy)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB make)
                      (NP (PRP them))
                      (PP (IN as)
                        (NP (DT a) (JJ single) (NN stick) (NN right))))))))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN answer))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (DT this) (NN conundrum))))
    (VP (VBZ does) (RB not)
      (VP (VB lie)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN practicality))
            (PP (IN of)
              (S
                (VP (VBG making)
                  (ADJP (JJ sure))
                  (SBAR (IN that)
                    (S
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (PRP You))
                        (NP (NNP Char) (NNP Kway)))
                      (VP (VBZ does) (RB n't)
                        (VP (VB keep)
                          (S
                            (VP (VBG rolling)
                              (PRT (RP around))
                              (PP (IN in)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT the) (NN cauldron))
                                  (PP (IN of)
                                    (NP (JJ boiling) (NN oil)))))
                              (, ,))))))))))))))))

prep(answer-2, to-3)
det(conundrum-5, this-4)
pobj(to-3, conundrum-5)

neg(lie-8, not-7)

prep(lie-8, in-9)
det(practicality-11, the-10)
pobj(in-9, practicality-11)
prep(practicality-11, of-12)
pcomp(of-12, making-13)
acomp(making-13, sure-14)
mark(keep-22, that-15)
det(You-17, the-16)
nsubj(keep-22, You-17)
nn(Kway-19, Char-18)
dep(You-17, Kway-19)
aux(keep-22, does-20)
neg(keep-22, n't-21)
ccomp(making-13, keep-22)
xcomp(keep-22, rolling-23)
prt(rolling-23, around-24)
prep(rolling-23, in-25)

pobj(in-25, cauldron-27)

                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN death))

(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB -RRB-))
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN reason))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB why))
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADVP (RB also))
              (VP (VBN known)
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (NNP Cantonese)))
                (PP (IN as)
                  (NP
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNP Yao) (NNP Char) (NNP Guai))
                      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NN oil) (NNP fried) (`` ``) (NNP Hui) ('' ''))
                          (SBAR
                            (WHNP (WDT which))
                            (S
                              (VP (VBZ sounds)
                                (PP (IN like)
                                  (NP (`` ``)
                                    (NP (NNS ghosts))
                                    ('' '')
                                    (PP (IN in)
                                      (NP (NNP Cantonese)))))))))
                        (-RRB- -RRB-)))
                    (PP (IN as)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (NN sort))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP
                            (NP (NN curse))
                            (PP (IN on)
                              (NP (DT the) (JJ treacherous) (NN couple)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (PP (IN except)
      (NP (DT that)))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (RB only)
    (VP (VB get)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP You))
          (VP
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Char) (NNP Kway))
              (SBAR
                (S

                                (NP (NN bulk))))))))))))

              (ADVP (RB together))
              (PP (IN with)

                  (NP (DT the) (JJ other) (NN stuff))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (EX There))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP (RB only) (CD one) (NN way))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB find)
              (PRT (RP out)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (DT that))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB try)
              (NP (DT the) (NN recipe))
              (PP (IN out)
                (NP (PRP myself)))
              (PP (IN at)
                (NP (NN home)))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB see)
                    (SBAR (IN if)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP I))
                        (VP (MD can)
                          (VP (VB replicate)
                            (NP (DT the) (NN taste))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

          (NP (NN something))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT that))
            (S
              (VP (MD will)
                (VP (VB make)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (ADJP (JJ full)
                      (PP (IN for)
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN day))))))))))))
    (VP (VBZ does) (RB n't)
      (NP (PRP it)))
    (. ?)))


nsubj(does-13, Sounds-1)
prep(Sounds-1, like-2)
pobj(like-2, something-3)
nsubj(make-6, that-4)
aux(make-6, will-5)
rcmod(something-3, make-6)
nsubj(full-8, you-7)
xcomp(make-6, full-8)
prep(full-8, for-9)
det(day-12, the-10)
amod(day-12, whole-11)
pobj(for-9, day-12)
root(ROOT-0, does-13)
neg(does-13, n't-14)
dobj(does-13, it-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Conclusion))
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (VP (VBP tell)
      (NP (PRP us)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(tell-3, Conclusion-1)
advmod(tell-3, So-2)
root(ROOT-0, tell-3)
dobj(tell-3, us-4)


(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB where))
    (SQ (VBP do)
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VB get)
        (NP (PRP$ your)
          (ADJP
            (NP (PRP You))
            (JJ Zha))
          (JJ Kueh) (NN fix))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(get-4, where-1)
aux(get-4, do-2)
nsubj(get-4, you-3)
root(ROOT-0, get-4)
poss(fix-9, your-5)
npadvmod(Zha-7, You-6)
amod(fix-9, Zha-7)
amod(fix-9, Kueh-8)
dobj(get-4, fix-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ last) (NN time) (NN I))
    (VP (VBD asked)
      (NP (DT this) (NN question))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (PRP$ our) (NN facebook) (NN page))))
    (, ,)))


det(I-4, The-1)
amod(I-4, last-2)
nn(I-4, time-3)
nsubj(asked-5, I-4)
root(ROOT-0, asked-5)
det(question-7, this-6)
dobj(asked-5, question-7)
prep(asked-5, on-8)
poss(page-11, our-9)
nn(page-11, facebook-10)
pobj(on-8, page-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ seems)
      (SBAR (IN like)
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (ADVP (RB no) (RB longer))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (NP (DT any) (JJ legendary))))))))


nsubj(seems-2, it-1)
root(ROOT-0, seems-2)
mark(have-7, like-3)
nsubj(have-7, we-4)
advmod(longer-6, no-5)
advmod(have-7, longer-6)
advcl(seems-2, have-7)
det(legendary-9, any-8)
dobj(have-7, legendary-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (NP (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNS men))
    (VP (VBD left))
    (. .)))


nsubj(left-5, You-1)
nn(men-4, Char-2)
nn(men-4, Kway-3)
nsubj(left-5, men-4)
root(ROOT-0, left-5)


(ROOT
  (X
    (X
      (NP
        (NP (PRP You))
        (NP (NNP Zha) (NNP Kueh) (NNP Blk)))
      (NP (CD 216))
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Bedok) (NNP North) (NNP St))
        (NP (CD 1))))
    (NP
      (NP (# #) (CD 01-43))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (NNP Singapore) (NNP 460216) (NNP 3.30))
          (VP (VBP am)
            (PP (IN till)
              (NP (CD 12pm)))))))))


dep(St-8, You-1)
nn(Blk-4, Zha-2)
nn(Blk-4, Kueh-3)
dep(You-1, Blk-4)
dep(St-8, 216-5)
nn(St-8, Bedok-6)
nn(St-8, North-7)
dep(01-43-11, St-8)
dep(St-8, 1-9)
dep(01-43-11, #-10)
root(ROOT-0, 01-43-11)
nn(3.30-14, Singapore-12)
nn(3.30-14, 460216-13)
nsubj(am-15, 3.30-14)
rcmod(01-43-11, am-15)
prep(am-15, till-16)
pobj(till-16, 12pm-17)
